author: rogerrut
msg: SSO -- Added documentation for SSO. Overview of SSO component (Schema, Classes and OJB mapping)

author: taylor
msg: column sizes in the layout portlets were being ignored
column sizes are now being applied to multicolumn portlets
this may affect your pages, suggest testing pages with this new functionality
if you don't specify a column size init param, no sizes are applied

author: taylor
msg: 2.2 was causing an error in Tomcat 4.1.30 on the <listener> tag
With Tomcat 4.1.30, Im receiving errors like

2005-01-28 23:08:26 Exception initializing TldLocationsCache: XML parsing error on file /WEB-INF/lib/portals-bridges-struts-0.2.jar: (line 511, col 13): The content of element type "attribute" must match "(name,required?,rtexprvalue?)".
I really don't have much more time to look into this now
I'll log an issue after testing against 4.1.31
